changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_complete_achievements') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_complete_achievements GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_complete_achievements @character_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT achievement_code, complete_at FROM dbo.Complete_Achievements WHERE character_id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_complete_achievements') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_complete_achievements GO
